This document describes the current stable version of Celery (4.2). For development docs, go here.

celery.app.backends¶

Backend selection.

celery.app.backends.by_name(backend=None, loader=None, extension_namespace='celery.result_backends')[source]¶

Get backend class by name/alias.

celery.app.backends.by_url(backend=None, loader=None)[source]¶

Get backend class by URL.
